content:
So i have a few questions really..
What is a fhir response?
What is all the metadata looking stuff in the response payload?
What can fhir represent?
How do i get started handcrafting an example FHIR response?
HELP MEEEEE

I responded to one of the two threads you started in the implementers channel. Please review our guide at https://confluence.hl7.org/display/FHIR/FHIR+Rules+for+Asking+Questions and refrain from creating threads in multiple channels with overlapping content.
My bad. Ill try and be as helpful with how i ask things as possible. New to all this
Use a tenner to buy an epub of https://link.springer.com/book/10.1007/978-3-319-30370-3 and spend an afternoon. Best use of your time if you want to avoid head scratching.
